website_summaries.verdict: A versatile, heavy-duty spare tire carrier that can securely hold most tires without wobbling.
pros: Fits 4- and 5-lug tires of any size
Mounts to trailer tongues up to 3" wide and 4" high
cons: Users have said that the included lock isn't as sturdy as they would have hoped

customer_reviews.title: Just to let you know this thing is great. the lock is fairly useless
customer_reviews.text: Just to let you know this thing is great. the lock is fairly useless. if someone wants the rim or tire they just need a socket set to remove the 4 nuts and bolts that hold onto the trailer, but may work as a deterrent. furthermore, it worked on my jet ski trailer, but on my snowmobile trailer with an 8" rim, you can not thread on the locking hardware on and might as well throw it out. manufacturer should note a minimum size for rims in which the lock works.
customer_reviews.author: MoreSnow

customer_reviews.title: I think that this is the best plan
customer_reviews.text: It works good but the bolts on the back side can be removed - I have a Master 3⁄8 inch locking cable - six foot - entwined front and back and through the wheel holes and front and back brackets -I know that is only a delaying device for a thief. I keep thinking that the people I am parking next to are not interested in my wheel more than they are interested in being just happy fisherman.
customer_reviews.author: Raz

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but not great quality control
customer_reviews.text: The mount arrived quickly and included all parts described. The back bracket should be one solid piece to match the front and one of the securing tabs was cross threaded so it doesn't work properly. So much for being able to lock the spare tire on. I will have to come up with some other way to secure the tire against theft. Those issues aside, the item seems to be made of sturdy materials, hopefully they hold up to the elements and don't rust quickly.
customer_reviews.author: M. Millias

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than Harbor Freight, Sturdy and effective design
customer_reviews.text: Not practical to have a lock. Not so easy to install, not for lack of strength, its just a bit akward trying to get it all lined up, no directions or photo whatsoever ever puts the noggin to the test triple thinking which bolt goes which way and where for what reason
customer_reviews.author: Vicki and Chris

customer_reviews.title: Decent value, checks a lot of boxes.
customer_reviews.text: The paint is not very strong, so you get what you pay for. That being said, I would purchase again, it’s the only inexpensive tire mount with a big enough offset to clear my boat. The instructions say it is good for 100lbs. I hit it with some sandpaper and a coat of spray paint to match my color before installing. The lock feature is a nice touch even if it’s just a deterrent.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Really like this. It attached quick and very easily to my trailer and seems secure. I was hauling our boat 6 hours and I needed a place to carry a spare tire (just in case). Had no issues with it during our trip. I like the ability to lock the spare tire on.
customer_reviews.author: RickG

customer_reviews.title: It's Ok, Well Built, But tabs don't tighten to the spare wheel enough and causes damage to the stud.
customer_reviews.text: It's Okay, the mount is sturdy to the trailer. But what I don't like is that you cannot make the locking tabs tighten to the wheel firmly which allows the wheel of your spare tire to rock around and damage the studs that it sits on in this bracket. Overall though it did solve my issue of being able to mount my spare tire to the trailer in case I ever need it.
customer_reviews.author: D and C

customer_reviews.title: Replacemrnt parts
customer_reviews.text: I have had this spare tire mount om my trailer for 2 years and it works grate. My only issue, and it is my fault, is I have lost or missed placed the locking brackets. Now I need to lock the spare as I have to leave my trailer unattended. I have been unable to locate the missing brackets to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spare tire mount
customer_reviews.text: I own a car hauler trailer and needed to mount a spare tire. My tire is a five lug tire similar in size to a standard automotive tire. After reading the reviews of quite a few of the spare tire mounts I chose the Tow Tuff unit. It was easy to install and my spare tire attached with no difficulty. I am pleased with the good construction of the unit and am very happy I chose a mount with a locking feature.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas P. Byrne Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Mounts easily and there are a lot of options for different ...
customer_reviews.text: Mounts easily and there are a lot of options for different heights. I set mine so that when the trailer is not hooked up to truck the spare tire keeps the tongue off the ground kinda like a jack on a larger trailer would. This helps to keep it more level and avoids pinched wires. The lock gizmo seems like it is more for show than any thing. I could get the tire off with a lock on it if I really wanted to.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler M

customer_reviews.title: NOT MADE IN THE USA
customer_reviews.text: I asked before I bought it as to where it was made. I was told it was made in the USA. it was NOT. it has made in China stamped on the back. I welded mine on. Its was rusting when it came out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Kowboy84

customer_reviews.title: Really nice bracket
customer_reviews.text: This bracket fit very well on the tongue of my TSC 6' X 8' utility trailer. The lock is a cleaver idea. This unit isn't impossible to steal, but it will slow them down a bunch.
customer_reviews.author: BFF

customer_reviews.title: Good tire mount
customer_reviews.text: It mounted to the tongue of my 4'x8' Tractor supply trailer right next to the drop leg with no problems. I was concerned that it would interfere with the rotation of the leg, but it fits. The tire mounted fine without drilling any extra holes. It's been on the trailer about 400 miles so far without a rattle. I got this from Amazon warehouse as a used item in good condition. It was dirt cheap there. The box was pretty banged up but the parts were all there and undamaged.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Klinedinst

customer_reviews.title: Adequate
customer_reviews.text: This carrier is made for smaller trailers. If you want it to fit a standard size camper bumper, you will need to buy longer bolts. It also does Not fit 6 lug rims.
customer_reviews.author: Wanderlust Farms

customer_reviews.title: Worked Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: The spare tire carrier went on in 15 minutes and is as secure and tough as any part of the trailer. Looks good too. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: S B Mac

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic option!
customer_reviews.text: I had an awkward mounting angle and this thing has lots of possible ways to mount. Looks great and a snap to put on.
customer_reviews.author: BigBoy51

customer_reviews.title: What you should know
customer_reviews.text: The spare tire lock doesn't lock the spare wheel in tight. Requires a tie down to keep from rattling.
customer_reviews.author: hank diaz

customer_reviews.title: would  purchase  again
customer_reviews.text: it was straight forward and easy to install with an 18mm wrench and socket. the lock feature I do not trust, but is a decent deterrent for almost honest folks
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on, worked perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my spare tire on my Nitro Z7. 14x5.5 rim. worked perfectly. I ended up not using the locking mechanism and just bought a 6 foot cable and a lock so I could wrap it around my trailer frame and through my tire rim bc if someone really wanted the spare they can just unbolt the thing from the frame. Worked great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Holloway

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Easy install. A professional thief would have little trouble removing your tire however for the money it does a decent job of holding your spare.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Easily Adaptable for proper wheel and tire placement
customer_reviews.text: Satisfied with mounting hardware , all pieces were present and easy to assemble with secure and solid support
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I don’t use the the lock feature so, I can’t comment on that but, the tire holder is great!
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: It fit over my 3x2 square tubing well and holds the tire securely. I didn't use the lock.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri Bullock

customer_reviews.title: Had to file a bit on the lower carriage bolt ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to file a bit on the lower carriage bolt cutout to get my 5-bolt spare to fit. They need to check their geometry and correct the cutouts. I think the locking setup is cheezy - went to Ace and got a couple lug nuts to hold the tire on. I figure if someone wants to steal it they can unbolt the tire/mount from the frame anyway.
customer_reviews.author: JiminCA

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly mounts to trailer arm for spare
customer_reviews.text: I installed this to my trailer arm to attach (and lock) my trailer spare. Really need to crank the wrench but once on, it's ON! The lock bracket is the dumbest thing though -- all a would-be thief has to do is remove the nuts on the back. Like duh design team! Use a lugnut lock and don't install the lock bracket!
customer_reviews.author: Majkboy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars to Two Stars - updated
customer_reviews.text: Solid product, it's likely to last as long as the trailer itself. Edit: I got an email asking if I could answer a question about this and just realized I forgot to update my review. This tire holder didn't last nearly as long as the trailer. It might work well for freshwater or dry work but it started rusting after less than a year and in about two years it nearly fell off of the trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Craash420

customer_reviews.title: not 4.5 they lied
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit 4.5 its for a 5inch. I had to drill new holes. 3rd one that said 4.5 and is wrong
customer_reviews.author: Junior morales

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: The carrier fits well and is very sturdy. Hope to get years of service.
customer_reviews.author: Herbert

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the money
customer_reviews.text: I think this would have been great for the money. Unfortunately I did not read the sizing correctly and it would not fit my 6" tubular trailer. I gave it to my son who will use it on his smaller boat trailer. My bad! Just make sure you understand the size needed for your mounting position.
customer_reviews.author: Warrior3735

customer_reviews.title: Works as designed
customer_reviews.text: I clamped it on my trailer and then bolted on the spare. After driving 500 miles, it has not fallen off, that is a plus! well worth the money! Those two angle pieces are confusing and are for locking the wheel on the bracket. They are a distraction and waste of time - toss them. Use locking lug if you want to keep wheel from being stolen.
customer_reviews.author: A. Kall

customer_reviews.title: Haven't forgotten my spare since I installed this!
customer_reviews.text: It's only a chunk of metal to some, but to me this saves me from storing my spare in my vehicle with it's limited space, or inside my trailer, which is already packed with gear. I also have never forgotten my spare tire since I attached it to my tongue! Well built, and I love the locking ability!
customer_reviews.author: pablo arnoldo

customer_reviews.title: EASY TO INSTALL
customer_reviews.text: THEY NEED A BLOW TORCH TO TAKE MY SPARE NOW.
customer_reviews.author: joeb3875

customer_reviews.title: Does what you need
customer_reviews.text: This kit is complete, but the instructions leave a lot to be desired. Still, most of it is pretty straight forward.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh Noland

customer_reviews.title: Well built! The locking mechanism is not worth using though.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty well built and fits my application perfectly. Cant beat it for the money.
customer_reviews.author: jeff h.

customer_reviews.title: Not for small trailer tires.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy and strong. Does fit my Triton trailer....but it does not fit 18.5 x 8.5 - 8 tires with 4.5 bolt pattern for Triton trailers. The plate is too big for the rim to fit flush against. Returned it. Wish it would have said that prior to ordering!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Installed and work fine. Locked on to the frame fine
customer_reviews.text: Installed and work fine. Locked on to the frame fine. Did not like the design of the studs for the tire. Added a thin 1/2 inch nut to the studs with the lock washers to lock in the studs into the carrier so the tire could be placed on and off without the studs moving. Made a good part so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby R

customer_reviews.title: You might have to be creative to make it work.
customer_reviews.text: Worked for me but I had to mount it flat on the tongue A frame cross bar because the spare tire dragged going over dips when mounted on the A frame side rail. Mounted as high as it would go and still the tire dragged. Made it work for me though.
customer_reviews.author: A. Dezutter

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Great spare tire bracket. Took minutes to mount. Very straight forward and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to mount but could be improved with a way ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to mount but could be improved with a way to secure the mounting bolts in the back to discourage theft of the spare tire.
customer_reviews.author: Sarge

customer_reviews.title: Works with 4-stud spare tire from Harbor Freight Tool
customer_reviews.text: Functions to place spare tire onto folding trailer, both bought from Harbor Freight Tools. Have not tried lock yet so don't know if that will work. It seems like a regular pad lock won't work, as the wheel center opening is big enough to slide over the whole padlock itself, making it useless.
customer_reviews.author: Powell

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Simple but well made, the lugs perfectly match the spacing for my 5 lug 13" wheel. I needed to add nuts on the lugs to hold the bolts in place on the carrier & reduce the length so the lug wrench depth would fit the supplied lug nuts.
customer_reviews.author: C17Rocky

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed by this carrier. A little tricky to get it mounted but not difficult. Does the same thing as products costing at least double the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product well built heavy duty.
customer_reviews.text: This works as advertised. Tried mounting on the top of the tow bar instead of on the side and it worked fine but puzzled out that my spear would get full of water after rain so moved it to the side as directed.
customer_reviews.author: Gerard L. Charest

customer_reviews.title: Locking tabs
customer_reviews.text: I saw lots of things saying "how is this supposed to lock anything". The tabs thread onto the bolt and cannot spin to be unthreaded once locked together. Lugs cannot be removed keeping your tire locked
customer_reviews.author: Keith K.

customer_reviews.title: Haven't installed this yet but looks straight forward. My ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't installed this yet but looks straight forward. My only problem is my trailer is all angle iron, not flat sided as they show in the pics. I will weld the bracket instead of bolting it on most likely.
customer_reviews.author: T Griffis

customer_reviews.title: Using a tape measure it is a good 2 inches off from one side of the 15 ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made, heavy duty bracket. My problem with it is it's not square. I bolted the bracket to one of the framerails on my trailer and when I mounted the spare tire it looked all crooked. Using a tape measure it is a good 2 inches off from one side of the 15 inch tire to the other. Other than that it's good.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie McLaughllin

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: I can’t install it without the bolts and not one bolt was shipped with it.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Balzer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Works good but it's a universal size. Best if you weld it in place.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Good product still not 100% theft proof.
customer_reviews.text: It seems like a good product, but it's still not theft proof. All someone has to do is take the nuts off the mount on the trailer and the whole thing is theirs. Granted they prob won't be able to use it till they cut the lock but if someone wants it they can still get it, but prob will deter most people.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: mount easy and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: great tire and mounted on my dump trailr, worked out great
customer_reviews.author: derrick b.

customer_reviews.title: Mount me!
customer_reviews.text: mounted it on my utility trailer without an issue.have solid steel sides so i drilled some holes and BAM!all done,put a keyed matching lock on it and we are good to go.Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: COREY SMITH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we were looking for to mount a spare tire onto our trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S. Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: This is a great purchase. I used it to put the spare tire of my Little Guy 5 wide on the frame and get it out of the way for more storage. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Slippyfist

customer_reviews.title: Not for 6 lug.
customer_reviews.text: Will not work as delivered for a 6lug wheel. Had to drill an extra hole to make it work..solid unit though.
customer_reviews.author: Davis Home Maintenance

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Tire carrier fit perfectly on the tongue of the trailer. Brackets for lock didn't fit my trailer rim, but easily secured the tire and bracket with a cable bicycle lock.
customer_reviews.author: Linda L Hahn

customer_reviews.title: Worked alright a little to close to bumper when mounted ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked alright a little to close to bumper when mounted to my trailer tounge so had welded to winch plate seems well built
customer_reviews.author: Josh Roberts

customer_reviews.title: but it was easily installed and fit our Hoosier trailer perfectly
customer_reviews.text: It's a spare tire carrier so not much to say about it, but it was easily installed and fit our Hoosier trailer perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: HuskyLover

customer_reviews.title: Bolt Pattern Not Correct
customer_reviews.text: The bolt holes did not fit the spare tire wheel. It's a 14", 5 bolt pattern and neither hole allowed it to fit. Had to drill an additional hole in the plate to attached the spare tire. Incurred the cost of a 1/2 inch drill bit to make it fit.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product but
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit a five lug rim one hole doesn't work it's not long enough to match up
customer_reviews.author: Honda mays

customer_reviews.title: Made for small 5 or 4 lug rims.
customer_reviews.text: Great spare tire holder. Lug pattern is for small 5 lug or 4 lug. I installed this on my car trailer. My rims are 6 lug and it works. But it only holds by one lugnut. I modified a piece of metal bar to hold the opposite sides. This was a great set up.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse K.

customer_reviews.title: Works as displayed, but with angel iron mount had ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as displayed, but with angel iron mount had to put in a piece of wood to even out the mount surface, other wise kept tilting down while pulling the trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: strong, well built and when installed was more than ...
customer_reviews.text: strong , well built and when installed was more than needed to carry my spare tire and wheel, reasonbly priced
customer_reviews.author: Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Pretty well-made product, the only reason I'm giving it one less than five stars is because the locking feature is really just for looks. All someone needs to steal your spare tire is a wrench.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Lenherr

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good product and easy to assemble. Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: TrikePete

customer_reviews.title: i ordered this because i have a 5 lug 4 ...
customer_reviews.text: i ordered this because i have a 5 lug 4.5" spare, it did not fit my spare tire, the 4.5" is off on the bracket.
customer_reviews.author: glenna m egan

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Spare
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my boat trailer, now there are no more worries about one of the tires blowing and now having a back up. Was very easy to install and to mount the extra tire.
customer_reviews.author: Lori H

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy/Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and well made. Securely mounts spare and looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Chassis Dog

customer_reviews.title: So sad
customer_reviews.text: One in the bolt was stripped couldn’t put the nut on and looked everywhere for another bolt nobody could match it.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Cormier

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: installed easy, not really universal, would not fit my 6 hole 225 rim with 2 bolts, had to improvise.....
customer_reviews.author: daniel wall

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit 13" with 5x4.5
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit 13" wheel with 5x4.5 as stated online. Returned next day
customer_reviews.author: Sushisnob

customer_reviews.title: It'll work!
customer_reviews.text: Works like it's supposed to. Bolts for attaching to the trailer are long, plan on cutting them off.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: every trailer needs a spare
customer_reviews.text: very easy to install and lock your tire in place
customer_reviews.author: Amazon CustomerR Miles

customer_reviews.title: Good design, but check to be sure for tire clearance.
customer_reviews.text: Good design and secure, but may need to modify due to shorter hitch frame (tongue) as trailer is V nose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon CustomerJeffHVT

customer_reviews.title: Locking Mechanism is Use Less
customer_reviews.text: The locking mechanism is held on by the lug nuts that hold the tire in place, which means that all you need to remove the tire and lock is a lug wrench. I used a chain to lock the tire in place.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory G.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The “universal fits all” did not fit the wheel I had without some drilling modifications I had to make.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Michael Harris

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfect and easy install
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfect and easy install. Don't know why they had to use grade 8 bolts though had to use a grinder to cut them off in length hacksaw wouldn't touch them.
customer_reviews.author: cabmaker

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRICE!
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS WELL MADE...I AM GOING TO HAVE IT WELDED TO MY BOAT TRAILER SO THE CAN'T STEAL THE TIRE AND MOUNT TOGETHER.... GREAT PRICE!!
customer_reviews.author: David B. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price and securly holds my spare tire with ease.
customer_reviews.author: John Galt

customer_reviews.title: Tire carrier
customer_reviews.text: Have not used but expect it to work when I need it.
customer_reviews.author: Jrob

customer_reviews.title: too small for a regular sized tire
customer_reviews.text: It was too small to hold the tire for my trailer. This is for very small tires.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: exactly what you think pretty sturdy, put it on with my impact gun
customer_reviews.author: Mike in Miami

customer_reviews.title: I'm using it to hold a 15in rim/tire for my tandem axle trailer and it works great.
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for my application. I'm using it to hold a 15in rim/tire for my tandem axle trailer and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: wvrktguy

customer_reviews.title: Mounted very easy onto my trailer
customer_reviews.text: Mounted very easy onto my trailer. Had to force the tire on to be mounted properly but other than that I'm pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tanner Reed

customer_reviews.title: I have a 6 lug tire, so this one ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a 6 lug tire, so this one the wrong one. I just drilled a hole to make it work.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Crane

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was my second one like this. Just what you need for hanging the spare outside the wagon.
customer_reviews.author: Magnut

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works fine with one exception. The tire lock brackets don't line up no matter which bolt pattern you try.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Schweickert

customer_reviews.title: had to be modified by drilling new hole for second ...
customer_reviews.text: had to be modified by drilling new hole for second bolt for rim of spare to fit properly. locking arms serve no purpose at this point..
customer_reviews.author: prman

customer_reviews.title: Works fine for 5 x 4.5 bolt pattern
customer_reviews.text: Mounted on my boat trailer with 13" 5x4.5 bolt pattern wheels without any issues. The package arrived pretty beat up and open but everything was new and still in the box.
customer_reviews.author: brc1981

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: installed perfect just need a little more height for more ground clearance.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Ripoff, doesn't fit
customer_reviews.text: Details never said it did not fit a 15" wheel with 5"bolt circle. Very poor details to get you to buy it. Doesn't fit waste of my money
customer_reviews.author: Frank W Laythorpe

customer_reviews.title: Tow Tuff Spare Tire Carrier with Lock
customer_reviews.text: This is a great price for this spare tire bracket. It looks great on my 16ft trailer, and I had no problem mounting my 5 lug wheel on it. Make sure it doesn't interfere with your trailer jack prior to tightening it down. If the bolts stick out too much, just reverse them. I would also apply some thread lock on the bolts as the nuts are not nylon lock nuts.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great and is very affordable. Happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shantzonpoint

customer_reviews.title: excellent workmanship
customer_reviews.text: great buy and easy to install at a great price too!
customer_reviews.author: wildaboutu

customer_reviews.title: Easy mount Tire Carrier
customer_reviews.text: This carrier mounted easily and is a neat mount for my spare boat tire.
customer_reviews.author: Jerico1

customer_reviews.title: Rugged and well made
customer_reviews.text: Does what it is suppose to, well designed and well constructed spare tire bracket. Much less expensive than most and built like it will last.
customer_reviews.author: DAMorrow

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bolts dont line up with wheel pattern . Had to jerry rig it to work
customer_reviews.author: Craig Williams

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit on the side of my jet ski trailer, very heavy duty and universal.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Worked out great on my trailer from Tractor Supply
customer_reviews.text: Worked out great on my trailer from Tractor Supply. My 13" 5-lug spare fit perfect between the trailer body and the tongue.
customer_reviews.author: hyatt200

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: Installation was easy. Fits my trailer and existing spare tire, perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: F. Lyle

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had to make a few adjustments, but I got it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Tow Tuff TTF-0345TC Universal Spare Tire Carrier with Lock
product_meta.description:
Tow Tuff brings you the TTF-0345TC Universal Spare Tire Carrier – your solution for carrying a spare tire for your trailer. The Spare Tire Carrier with Lock is universal to fit most trailer tongues up to 3” wide and 4” high to fit on a wide variety of trailers. The bolt circle fits 4 and 5 lug rims and will accept 4 and 4.5 bolt circle tires. The overall size of this Tow Tuff product is 13” x 4” x 6.25”, making it the ideal size to fit onto your trailer. Installation is fast and easy with the bolt-on design and included zinc-plated mounting hardware. For your convenience, the Spare Tire Carrier even contains 7/16” pre-drilled holes to make attachment even easier. The Tow Tuff carrier has a weight capacity of 100 lbs., ensuring that you can work with this product through a variety of different tire needs. With the welded, heavy-duty steel construction and powder-coat finish, you can be assured that this tire carrier is durable and reliable. This carrier includes free locking tabs/brackets. Note: Padlock not included.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
1 year Manufacturer limited warranty.
feature_bullets: The Universal Spare Tire Carrier with Lock is universal to fits most trailer tongues up to 3” wide and 4” high. The bolt circle fits 4 and 5 lug rims and will accept 4 and 4.5 bolt circle tires
Overall dimensions of 13” x 4” x 6.25”, making it the ideal size to fit onto your trailer. Contains 7/16” pre-drilled holes to make attachment even easier
The Tow Tuff carrier has a weight capacity of 100 lbs., ensuring that you can work with this product through a variety of different tire needs!

Constructed of welded, heavy-duty steel with a powder-coat finish, this tire carrier is durable and reliable. Installation is fast and easy with the bolt-on design and included zinc-plated mounting hardware
Product includes FREE locking tabs/bracket. Note: Padlock not included. 1 year limited Manufacturer's parts warranty
